ygData.subject: Re: (unknown)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think EQ is still a good game to play, but now it would be hard to really injoy the game.. even now i find it hard to really enjoy it... prices in Baz. R
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "shwnquick" <shwnquick@...> wrote:
>
> A friend and played the eq for sevarl years I got out after the
> ldon. My freind recieve a email about the new everquest comeing but
> that was it so far. I enjoyed the game before ldon.
>
I think EQ is still a good game to play, but now it would be hard to
really injoy the game.. even now i find it hard to really enjoy it...
prices in Baz. R truely overpriced,and now with the new items comeing
out and the new xpansions. it makes it hard to really enjoy it... but i
do find myself comeing back to play EQ...
